main event: A large, bright object was sighted hovering over a field in Rose Center, Michigan on June 24, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as being larger than a jet aircraft and very bright, illuminating the ground around it.
The object appeared to be hovering over the field for several minutes before suddenly accelerating at a high rate of speed and disappearing from view.
The object was initially thought to be a fast-moving aircraft or satellite, but upon closer inspection, it was determined to be something unusual.
Two witnesses reported the sighting, and additional information regarding further sightings in the area was being sought.
The sighting was documented as part of Project Blue Book, the U.S. Air Force's official program for investigating unidentified flying objects.
